snippet.title: Castaway of the Ardusta Sea - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Going on another solo adventure, Aisha sets off by ship. Unfortunately, a sudden storm and the incursion of a giant sea monster hinder her path. Through the turmoil, she is thrown overboard and wakes up on an unknown island. Aisha must find her way home and survive the pirates and monsters that lurk both above ground and in the deep.

Castaway of the Ardusta Sea on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/castaway-of-the-ardusta-sea/

Castaway of the Ardusta Sea on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
